channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Microsoft pens AI cloud computing deal with former Ethereum miner CoreWeave: CNBC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The reported deal comes just a few days after CoreWeave announced an additional $200 million worth of funding via an extended Series B funding round.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Six months on from FTX, Tether mines BTC, and Nvidia’s AI superchips
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz also looks at the crypto industry after FTX collapse, Tether’s Bitcoin mining in Latin America, Tabi’s funding round and Nvidia’s artificial intelligence machines.

item.title: US lawmakers aim for crypto regulatory clarity with proposed bill putting the screws to SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The framework under the bill would allow certain tokens to qualify as digital commodities if they were decentralized and crack down on the SEC’s previous approach to crypto.

item.title: Arbitrum price soars after DeFi whale address resumes ARB accumulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: ARB’s price notched a double-digit gain after a popular DeFi whale address resumed buying the governance token, but is the rally sustainable?

item.title: Losses from crypto rug pulls outpaced DeFi exploits in May: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens had a bullish last week of May, with most of the tokens recovering from two weeks of bearish pressure.

item.title: Privacy-focused Aleo blockchain gets new wallet as mainnet launch approaches
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The wallet developer also raised $4.5 million from Hack VC and other firms to further advance ZK-based enterprise solutions.

item.title: Evertas expands crypto insurance offerings to include mining and raises limits
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Crypto insurance underwriter Evertas will increase coverage limits to $420 million per policy while adding additional mining coverage.

item.title: Price analysis 6/2: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are witnessing subdued price action, indicating a lack of buying interest from the larger players.

item.title: CBDC ‘may not be a compelling priority,' says Kenya’s central bank
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The central bank released its statement in response to comments on a CBDC discussion paper published in February 2022.

item.title: Stablecoins are a critical countermeasure to Operation Chokepoint
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sarah Austin
item.description: Stablecoins could help crypto firms to remove themselves from the banking system — and prevent the U.S. government from cutting off their financial lifelines.

item.title: Taurus deploys on Polygon blockchain for asset tokenization and custody
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Taurus raised $65 million in a funding round three months ago. Its clients can now issue digital securities automatically.

item.title: CFTC commissioner says proposal to reassess risk management could consider crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Christy Goldsmith Romero pointed to the collapse of FTX, Terra and Celsius in having the CFTC reconsider the way it handled risk management.

item.title: Bitcoin ‘big move’ due in July after March $30K push — Latest analysis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin has been busy “perfectly” mimicking its moves after the March 2020 crash, QCP Capital argues.

item.title: Binance market share chopped with the end of zero-fee BTC trading
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A Binance spokesperson told Cointelegraph that the company had forecasted the drop after its decision to end its zero-fee Bitcoin trading but that it’s “not a concern.”

item.title: Private ID verification wins Binance Web3 reality show
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Startups competed in a metaverse-based Web3 reality show called Build The Block to win an investment from Binance Labs.

item.title: Web3 gaming gets competitive edge as Maniac Panda Games joins Cointelegraph Accelerator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: European game studio Maniac Panda Games aims to onboard mainstream players to Web3 with its flagship MMO title.

item.title: Europe’s right-wing political groups find cause in crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Veronika Rinecker
item.description: Right-wingers are often advocates of Bitcoin, especially the decentralized nature of the currency. But does that mean crypto is a right-wing thing?

item.title: US debt ceiling, declining trust in banks send ETH staking to record highs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The record surge in Ethereum staking in May was attributed to the ongoing U.S. debt ceiling saga, confidence in the U.S. dollar, bank collapses and the high APR offered on ETH staking.

item.title: ​​OpenAI gets warning from Japanese regulators on data collecting
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Japanese privacy watchdog warned OpenAI about collecting sensitive data without permission, threatening further action.

item.title: Here’s how developers aim to store crypto inside NFTs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: From being an inventory system for gaming to being used in DAOs, Future Primitive’s Jayden Windle and Benny Giang spoke about use cases for ERC-6551.

item.title: Bitcoin wicks down to $26.5K, but trader eyes chance for ‘bullish surprise’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price upside is likely limited, market participants argue, with Bitcoin pinned below $27,500.

item.title: How to access Bitcoin network data without advanced IT skills
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Use user-friendly tools like blockchain explorers and public databases to access Bitcoin network data without advanced IT skills.

item.title: DCG asks judge to consolidate class-action suits to avoid conflicting decisions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Digital Currency Group CEO Barry Silbert argued in a letter to Judge Stefan Underhill that both cases share the same facts, legal issues and near-identical class definitions.

item.title: Qatar slammed for not taking enough action against crypto companies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.category: Sheikh Bandar bin Mohammed bin Saoud Al Thani
item.description: Qatar has been told by the Financial Action Task Force to improve its “understanding of more complex forms” of financial crime.

item.title: Coinbase Derivatives Exchange set to roll out BTC and ETH futures
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Coinbase Derivatives Exchange’s institutional-sized contracts will be sized at 1 Bitcoin and 10 Ether.

item.title: Losses from crypto rug pulls outpaced DeFi exploits in May: Beosin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Over $45 million was lost to exit scams in May, while exploits on DeFi protocols racked up less than half that amount over the same period.

item.title: Crypto markets ‘lackadaisical’ as institutional buying slows — Novogratz
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The Galaxy Digital CEO says there has been a recent lack of institutional interest in cryptocurrency buying, which has led to deflated enthusiasm in the markets.

item.title: Bitcoin mining firms keep building despite BTC mining profitability slump
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Crypto mining firm CleanSpark has been aggressively expanding its fleet of mining machines this year, despite mining profitability being far from its all-time highs.

item.title: Bitcoin did it better: AI search interest on Google reaches fever pitch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Google Trends data reveals that even though AI is the talk of the town, it still pales in comparison to Bitcoin in 2017. In China, it’s a completely different story.

item.title: Nike NFTs to make their way into EA Sports games and its millions of fans
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Nike’s “virtual creations” will be integrated into EA Sports games in the coming months.
